name: urllib
description: Help in opening URLs (mostly HTTP) in a complex world â€” basic and digest authentication, redirections, timeout and more. Base undici API.
author: fengmk2 <fengmk2@gmail.com> (https://github.com/fengmk2)

scripts.build: tsc --version && tshy && tshy-after && npm run build:version
scripts.build:cjs:test: cd test/cjs && rm -rf node_modules && npm link ../.. && node index.js
scripts.build:esm:test: cd test/esm && rm -rf node_modules && npm link ../.. && node index.js
scripts.build:mts:test: cd test/mts && rm -rf node_modules && npm link ../.. && tsc
scripts.build:test: npm run build && npm run build:cjs:test && npm run build:esm:test && npm run build:mts:test && npm run test-tsc
scripts.test-tsc: npm run test-tsc:cjs:es2021 && npm run test-tsc:cjs && npm run test-tsc:esm
scripts.test-tsc:cjs: cd test/fixtures/ts && rm -rf node_modules && npm link ../../.. && npm run build
scripts.test-tsc:cjs:es2021: cd test/fixtures/ts-cjs-es2021 && rm -rf node_modules && npm link ../../.. && npm run build
scripts.test-tsc:esm: cd test/fixtures/ts-esm && rm -rf node_modules && npm link ../../.. && npm run build
scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run cov && npm run prepublishOnly && npm pack && attw --pack
